name: Firefox  NightBlue Theme
description:
Full customization, toolbars, windows, options, popups, downloads...
Australis version compatible with XP Vista & Seven. Tested with aero enabled.
Addons supported ( themed ):
ublock origin, flashgot, staus-4-evar, DOMI, vacuum places improved.
additional_info:
Created  by Antonio Ferreiro "a3c" 12-03-2011.
12-03-2017.
Renewed a lot of code, now with CSS variables, you can change the colors easily ( see how in my facebook page ).

https://www.facebook.com/AntonFerreiroFerrero/
